bdi4jade.annotation

Annotation Type GoalOwner


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface GoalOwner
    This annotation allows to specify that a Goal belongs to a capability and, if so, whether is is internal or external. If a goal belongs to a capability, it is
    Author:
    ingridnunes

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends Capability> capability
      This attribute indicates the Capability that owns the Goal.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean internal
      This attribute indicates whether the Goal is internal.

    • Element Detail

      • capability

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends Capability> capability
        This attribute indicates the Capability that owns the Goal.
        Returns:
        the class of capability that owns the goal

      • internal

        public abstract boolean internal
        This attribute indicates whether the Goal is internal. If so, the goal can be dispatched only by the capability that owns the goal, or its children, and be achieved by plans of this capability (or its children). The default value is false.
        Returns:
        true is the goal is internal, false otherwise
        Default:
        false
